General.Name: Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills
General.Description: Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills engages in the production and sale of yarns. It offers cotton, blended, melange coloured, dyed, S twist, plied, core-spun, and crêpe yarns, as well as yarns on dye tubes. Its products are used in apparel/fashion/underwear; and home, technical, and medical textiles. The company was formerly known as Varvaressos S.A. Naoussa Spinning Mill and changed its name to Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills in January 2003. Varvaressos S.A. European Spinning Mills was founded in 1908 and is based in Naousa, Greece.
